Homework

for CSC 363 - Human Computer Interaction

CSC 363 HCI Home Assignments Schedule Policies Resources

Individual Homework

Overview

You will complete 4 individual homework assignments during the semester. Assignments 2 and 3 are designed to build up your individual skillsets to contribute to group design sprints. Most homework assignments will be evaluated using the design rubric (or similar).

Homework Assignments

Title Topic Who Weight Due
1. Good/Bad Design Human-Centered Design Process You 10% 9/2
2. Needfinding for Health Design Needfinding You 30% 9/4
3. Health Design Paper Prototyping You 40% 9/11
4. Campus Accessibility Accessible Design You 20% 10/14
